fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Every 3 nights, get the option to plant a real bomb or fake bomb.
- The next day, it will be announced in public that a bomb was planted.
- All players gain the ability to "Defuse" the night after the bomb is announced, doing no other action and being reduced to no defense as they attempt to defuse a bomb.
- At the end of the night, if the bomb was fake, learn the names and roles of all players who attempted to defuse it.
- At the end of the night, if the bomb was real, if less than 1/3 living players defused it, it blows up, giving all non-evil players a coma, roleblocking them for the next 3 nights (which surpasses roleblock immunity as the roleblock happens at the start of the night)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You start with 1 real bomb and 2 fake bombs.
